uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Interface Item

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Drink, Pizza, Product, Side

    public interface Item
    This interface is used to hold the methods for price and description which are used by all Products.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculatePrice()
      Calculates the price of the item based on varying factors associated with each Product.
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      By calling this method we can obtain the price of any particular item.
      java.math.BigDecimal getPrice()
      By calling this method we can obtain the price of any particular item.
      void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
      By calling this method we can obtain the description of any particular item.
      void setPrice(java.math.BigDecimal price)
      By calling this method we can set the price of any particular item.

    • Method Detail

      • getPrice

        java.math.BigDecimal getPrice()
        By calling this method we can obtain the price of any particular item.
        Returns:
        BigDecimal price - This is the price of the item.

      • setPrice

        void setPrice(java.math.BigDecimal price)
        By calling this method we can set the price of any particular item.
        Parameters:
        price - - This is the price of the item.

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        By calling this method we can obtain the price of any particular item.
        Returns:
        String description - This tells us whether it is a drink, side or pizza.

      • setDescription

        void setDescription(java.lang.String description)
        By calling this method we can obtain the description of any particular item.
        Parameters:
        description - - This tells us whether it is a drink, side or pizza.
